Comment.Language: On Tuesday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: Moi n/i P[oic n~oumetanoia: e~p~jintaermeta~noin: m~pate v~mou mas~yam n~rwi: qen nipul/ n~te a~men].
Teach me repentance Lord, so that I repent, before death shuts my mouth, inside the gates of Hades.

Comment.Language: On Tuesday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: Alla bwl e~bol ,w n/i e~bol: n~naparap~twma etos: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
But loose and forgive me / my many trespasses. / As the Good One and Lover of Mankind / have mercy on us according to Your great mercy.
